channel.title: nautilus on Goofing Osamu
channel.description: Recent content in nautilus on Goofing Osamu

item.title: Files (nautilus)
item.description: This is based on nautilus version 43.2 in 2023 (Debian/Bookworm). Gnome Files “Gnome Files” (a.k.a nautilus) is the default file manager for GNOME desktop environment. It is rather a simple file manager with primitive functionalities, but it can be extended to offer rich features. gnome-terminal started from nautilus using extension The nautilus-extension-gnome-terminal package is automatically installed when gnome-terminal is installed and enables nautilus GUI to start gnome-terminal CLI session. There are 2 ways.
